LanguageData.Bullet_TacticalPistol.label: tactical pistol bullet
LanguageData.GD_TacticalPistol.label: tactical pistol
LanguageData.GD_TacticalPistol.description: A Greydale Defense "Lynx". Light and easy to use, ideal personal defense weapon. It use small-caliber, high-velocity plasteel tipped cartridge.
LanguageData.GD_TacticalPistol.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.GD_TacticalPistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ModularRifle.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.GD_ModularCarbine.label: modular carbine
LanguageData.GD_ModularCarbine.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. This carbine model's light and compact design makes it suitable for security mission. It is a base platform of other MRS.
LanguageData.GD_ModularCarbine.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.GD_ModularCarbine.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.GD_ModularRifle.label: modular carbine
LanguageData.GD_ModularRifle.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. Because of its durable and simple design, this rifle model is very popular among remote colonies militia.
LanguageData.GD_ModularRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.GD_ModularRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_ModularDMR.label: marksman rifle bullet
LanguageData.GD_ModularDMR.label: modular DMR
LanguageData.GD_ModularDMR.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. This marksman rifle model is a great tool for precision fire support or hunting.
LanguageData.GD_ModularDMR.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.GD_ModularDMR.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.GD_ModularLMG.label: modular LMG
LanguageData.GD_ModularLMG.description: Greydale Defense "Panther" Modular Rifle System. This LMG model is good for support troops with its unceasing bursts.
LanguageData.GD_ModularLMG.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.GD_ModularLMG.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_HVSMG.label: pistol bullet
LanguageData.GD_HVSMG.label: GD HV SMG
LanguageData.GD_HVSMG.description: The "Caracal" is a SMG that manufactured by Graydale Defence. It was designed for close assault and fires special small calibre high velocity cartridges.
LanguageData.Bullet_MultiLauncher.label: frag grenade
LanguageData.GD_GrenadeLauncher.label: GD multi launcher
LanguageData.GD_GrenadeLauncher.description:
One of the most versatile fire support weapons, the "Jaguar" multi launcher is a reliable and effective fire support weapon. With a simple manipulation, if you have appropriate tools, you can change its setting.
Frag: Basic setting of the multi launcher. Low damage, affects large area. Buckshot: Cloce quater combat setting. Fires multiple bucks at once. Incendiary: Deals flame damage and sets target on fire. Smoke: Deals no damage. Provide smoke screen on target area.
LanguageData.GD_GrenadeLauncher.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.GD_GrenadeLauncher.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_INGrenadeLauncher.label: incendiary grenade
